a1: In which league to they participate?
a2: Ronaldo can't win games for Juventus by himself and I prefer Messi - Insigne
q3: But would Juventus win any games without Ronaldo?
a3: I think they would. Ronaldo is a great player and can do amazing things, he will definitely help
q4: they win the match without one person?
a4: Probably, after all it takes a team effort.
q5: Can they win without 2 players though?
a5: Only if the team doesn't show up.
